function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through respiratory droplets","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease, leading to higher infection rates and more severe illness","Mitigation":"Wearing masks, practicing social distancing, improving ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, HEPA filters","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in crowded spaces","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and education about COVID-19 transmission and prevention","Impact":"Misinformation, non-compliance with safety measures, increased spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Public health education campaigns, accurate and accessible information dissemination","Technologies":"Information kiosks, digital signage, educational apps","People":"General public, at-risk populations, individuals with low health literacy","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices in public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission, higher likelihood of contamination in shared environments","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, promoting hand hygiene, implementing touchless systems","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, antimicrobial surfaces, touchless fixtures","People":"General public, building occupants, visitors to public spaces","Owner":"Building management, custodial staff, facility operators"}]}
